title: Grand Theft Cosmo
ingredients: Ketel One Citroen, St. Germain, Solerno, Cranberry
instructions: Shake all ingredients over ice and strain into martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or a cranberry.
backstory: Named because Ashley stole this from me after I first made it and claimed it as her own.

title: Tina-rita
ingredients: Reposado tequila, Grand Marnier, Agave, Lime
instructions: Combine all ingredients and stir until agave dissolved. Pour over ice into salt rimmed glass.
backstory: Formerly called the Tiffany from HR-rita. The mixing of the drink was typical preceded by a call from Tina starting of with 'You are not going to believe this sh*t!'

title: Passenger Seat (The Sunday Cocktail)
instructions: Combine all ingredients and pour into lowball glass with a large ice cube
backstory: Modeled after the classic Sidecar cocktail. This is also known as Ashley's Sunday cocktail since she enjoys sipping this while watching the Green Bay Packers.

title: Empress Polly
ingredients: Botanist, Empress 1908 Indigo, St. Germain, Lavender bitters
instructions: Combine ingredients (including the lemon rind) and shake over ice. Strain into a martini glass leaving out the rind. Garnish with a lemon twist.
backstory: Created for Miss Polly at the beginning of Covid for an outdoor dinner.

title: Sixty Miles from Belfast
ingredients: Bushmills Black Bush, Luxardo Maraschino Originale, Amaro Nonino, Orange bitters
components: 1/2 oz Bushmills Black Bush Irish whiskey
instructions: Combine all ingredients and pour into lowball glass with a large ice cube. Garnish with a Luxardo cherry
backstory: Inspired by Ashley's client at the time who was in Northern Ireland. Bushmills is about 60 miles from Belfast.

title: I Want Something Orange
ingredients: Ciroc Summer Citrus, Ketel One Orange, Cranberry, Cointreau
instructions: Combine ingredients and shake over ice. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
backstory: Ashley was sitting on the deck looking over the lake and said 'I want something orange.'

title: Crazy Daisy
ingredients: Ketel One, Ketel One Citroen, Lillet Blanc, Simple, Lemon, Absinthe
instructions: Rinse martini glass with absinthe. Combine remaining ingredients and shake over ice. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
backstory: Created one evening when Ashely was fed up with Daisy (one of our English bulldogs).

title: A Touch of Spring
ingredients: Ketel One, St. Germain, Brut Sparkling Wine, Lemon
instructions: Pour sparkling wine into a coupe glass. Combine remaining ingredients and shake over ice. Strain into the coupe glass with the wine. Garnish with a lemon twist,

title: The Everly
ingredients: Empress 1908 Indigo, St. Germain, Cointreau, Brut Sparkling Wine
instructions: Combine first three ingredients into a shaker with ice and stir. Strain into a martini glass. Top with the sparkling wine. Garnish with a lemon twist.
backstory: Inspired by the birth of the beautiful Everly on 11-15-2022. A cocktail as elegant and beautiful as she.

title: Dog Park
ingredients: Bulldog gin, Rose sparkling wine, Lemon, Simple
instructions: Combine gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice and stir. Strain into a coupe glass. Top with the sparkling wine. Garnish with a lemon twist.
backstory: Created for Ashley after coming back from a trip to the dog park with Penelope (one of our English bulldogs).

title: Running Off With The Princess
ingredients: Empress 1908 Elderflower Rose, St. Germain, Solerno, Cranberry
instructions: Combine ingredients and shake over ice. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
backstory: Ashley requested something similar to a Grand Theft Cosmo...but different.

title: La Marguerite
ingredients: Reposado, Grand Marnier, Lime, Brut Sparkling Wine
instructions: Shake first three ingredients over ice and strain into champagne flute. Top with sparkling wine.

title: South Of The Border Flyover
instructions: Mix together and serve in lowball glass with a large ice cube. Garnish with an orange twist.
backstory: Ashley asked for a margarita-esque cocktail to sip while watching Super Bowl LVII. Inspired by the classic Paper Plane cocktail.

title: Blissful Oblivion
ingredients: Hpnotiq, Tanqueray Rangpur, Absolut Mango, Triple Sec
instructions: Combine ingredients and shake over ice. Strain into a coupe glass.
backstory: Inspired by Miss Pollyâ€™s request for an after dinner fireside cocktail.

title: The Polly-Colada
instructions: Combine ingredients and shake over ice. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge. Alternatively, can be served in a hurricane glass over ice with a straw.
backstory: Created for Polly who loves pina coladas, but did not want the extra calories. Add the milk to give the classic pina colada look.
